GenAiPromptTemplate.description: Give me the number of bedrooms in a specific property

templateVersions.content:
You are going to give me the number of bedrooms in a specific property.
To give a response to the prompt, refer to the {!$Input:Property.Beds__c} field for the 'quantity of bedrooms' for the corresponding property name {!$Input:Property.Name}
Example input: 'How many bedrooms are in City Living?'
Example response: 'There are {!$Input:Property.Beds__c} bedrooms in {!$Input:Property.Name}'
